translations: n．激增，急剧上升：指事物数量、力量或活动的迅速增长。

sentences.sentence: The time that upsurges in stock market of United States of the beginning of the year writes that article, look now more accord with our intuition.
sentences.translation: 那篇文章是在年初美国股市高涨的时间写的，现在看来更加符合我们的直觉了。

sentences.sentence: In the big environment that upsurges in tide of area economic integration, China still is in certain area economic integration besides, brought grim challenge to our country.
sentences.translation: 在区域经济一体化浪潮高涨的大环境中，中国还处于某些区域经济一体化之外，给我国带来了严峻的挑战。
